title: Total loss valuations and actual cash value (ACV) reports
dataVerified: Vehicle/property details, market value, depreciation, ACV calculation, valuation source
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents inflated total loss valuations. Domain binding verifies valuation service (NADA, Kelley Blue Book, CoreLogic). Prevents overpayment fraud. Standardized valuation reports suitable for OCR.
